availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel A. Jones (Jefferson County, Kentucky, express agent and notary public)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, express agent and notary public. Maryland native. Married to Abbie L. Jones. Father of Mattie S. Jones and Herbert W. Jones. Express agent in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed Mary Finkermire as a domestic servant in Jefferson County in 1860. Express agent in Jefferson County in 1861. Notary public in Jefferson County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 103.
